channel.title: CVE Feed for Thinkingreed Inc. -- F-RevoCRM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Thinkingreed Inc. -- F-RevoCRM

item.title: CVE-2023-41150|2023-09-06T12:35:41.294Z -- thinkingreed%20inc. -- f-revocrm
item.description: F-RevoCRM 7.3 series prior to version7.3.8 contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability. If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user who is using the product.

item.title: CVE-2023-41149|2023-09-06T12:35:22.757Z -- thinkingreed%20inc. -- f-revocrm
item.description: F-RevoCRM version7.3.7 and version7.3.8 contains an OS command injection vulnerability. If this vulnerability is exploited, an attacker who can access the product may execute an arbitrary OS command on the server where the product is running.
